content: this scrap buster beanie pattern was created with two purposes in mind one to use up some of the partial skeins of yarn sitting around the house and two to learn some new crochet stitches it is both a scrap buster and a stitch sampler i would qualify this as an intermediate pattern if you have not yet learned all of the stitches that are included please note that you can purchase this pattern in my ravelry store or you can find a free version with ads on my blog to view the free version go to https //www caabcrochet com/scrap-buster-beanie/ materials size 4 yarn in 5 different colors us j/ 6 0 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors finished size adult small 19 band 9 tall not including pom pom stitches & abbreviations used chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet hdss half double slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet quadtr quadruple treble ws wrong side rs right side skip skip yo yarn over special stitch bean stitch special technique crochet in the back loop only special technique crochet in the 3rd loop only special technique decreases
